attributes.action: make The Lord Archer of Weston-super-Mare Lord Mandelson's assistant if Mandelson is chosen as the new Information Minister
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: "Because let's face it, the only thing more ridiculous than appointing as minister for information a man who has been publically disgraced for deceiving a bank to the extent that he is unelectable and has had to enter parliament as a peer, is to appoint as his assistant another disgraced peer who has been jailed for perjury, deception and fraud.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
